name: Mini Maze (Dullame)
description:
Defeat enough enemies with various weapons in ten minutes.

  • WASD——Move
  • Mouse Move——Control Head
  • Left Mouse Button——Fire   Right Mouse Button——Special Function
  • Space Bar——Jump
  • Left Shift——Speed Up
  • R——Reload
  • G——Pick/Throw Weapon
  • Esc——Stop

Use Assert：
https://kaylousberg.itch.io/kaykit-dungeon 

https://delthor-games.itch.io/gun-pack

https://kickin-it-studios.itch.io/low-poly-weapon-pack
